Summary: Newepaper account of lights in sky
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Anson
There were no other sightings in Anson on or around February 21st 2007
divs: sighting detailsportland (me.) press herald, fri,2\23\2007. by larry grard, blethen maine news service. noted on pg.1, story on page b1,front page of 'local & state" section, right column, continued on page b4. wed, 2\21\07, 730 pm. gehri rinaldi and her son dalton mosher saw strange lights in the sky , and then lights going through the trees. there were at least 4 other reports to authorities at the somerset county communications center. officials postulated that three vermont air nat'l guard f-16 fighters were on training flights in the area. observers seem to indicate at least six simualtaneous objects.the other sigtitings were in fairfield,norridgewock, and skowhegan, maine. there were, the article states mentions there were also reported sightings in the farmington area a week ago that were discounted as flares... the article quotes a county sheriff at the end saying that he saw, and didn't report a ufo in that area in the 1970's that came within 15 feet of his cruiser. portland press herald: www.pressherald.com 207-791-6650
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
